lead_paragraph: An ex-sheriff teams up with a gun for hire to become marshal and deputy of a western town and and use the set-up as a way to catch the killer of the marshal's son--a killer who happens to be related to the now-deputy's former partner.
snippet: An ex-sheriff teams up with a gun for hire to become marshal and deputy of a western town and and use the set-up as a way to catch the killer of the marshal's son--a killer who happens to be related to the now-deputy's former partner.
